profile.name: Schuansk Torres
profile.bio: Hello, I am a human who constantly searches for new knowledge. I'm a developer who works mainly with NodeJS, ReactJS, React Native, and Kotlin. I think that we can't stop, so we will keep improving every day, not only as developers, but also as humans.

repositories.name: udoc
repositories.description: At one point, I was tired of taking notes in notepad and at the same time wanted to learn a little about NextJS, so UDOC came along. This is a simple project that aims to help you create documentation for projects. In UDOC it is possible to create Macros (projects) and add pages to it, the documentation.

repositories.name: Mongoal
repositories.description: I was tired of using electronic spreadsheets to organize my financial life, they are great, but they are tedious. So, taking advantage of the opportunity to put React Native and WatermelonDB learning into practice, Mongoal emerged, helping to track spending and gains, also defining a financial goal.

repositories.name: Basic calculator
repositories.description: This is a calculator with basic commands to add, subtract, divide and multiply. To make the user experience more fluid, the equals button has been removed, so every time a new number is added, the calculation takes place automatically.
